pullRequest.title: Resolves #1843
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
The issue come from calling the "equals" method on item slots for the armor. those return null when no armor is present, raising an exception.
Changes
Calling the method equals on the broken item to compare to the armor slot
Related Issues
Resolves #1843
Checklist


[x ] I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
[ x] I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.

nodes.bodyText:
That's a typo right there... "equalst".
You should always test your changes before commiting them. Especially seeing if it even compiles properly.
